patterns: How you could help me?
What can you do?
What help you provide?
How you can be helpful?
In which way you can help me?
responses:
If you have some health problem I can give yuo some advise to help you get better. You can tell me all your symptoms, and I'll try to understand what could be your problem. The more precise you are in describing the symptoms, the more precise I will be in understanding what your health problem is.
 Moreover, you can ask me also information about som kind of health problem or disease.

patterns: What is a heart attack?
What are the symptoms of a heart attack?
in what ways does a heart attack manifest itself?
how do i recognize a heart attack
heart attack symptoms
symptoms heart attack
responses:
An heart attack happens when a part of the heart muscle 
doesn't get enough blood. The symptoms may be:

 - Chest pain or discomfort.

- Feeling weak, light-headed, or faint.

- Pain or discomfort in one or both arms or shoulders.

- Shortness of breath.

patterns: What I have to do in case of heart attack.
What I can do in case of heart attack.
What should I do in case of heart attack.
if I notice symptoms of a heart attack what can i do?
how should i behave when heart attack occurs
what do you suggest me to do in case of heart attack?
What can I in do in case of heart attack ?
responses:
If you notice the symptoms of a heart attack in yourself or someone else, call the emergence number (112 in Italy) immediately. 
The sooner you get to an emergency room, the sooner you can get treatment to reduce the amount of damage to the heart muscle.
 At the hospital, health care professionals can run tests to find out if a heart attack is happening and decide the best treatment.
 In some cases, a heart attack requires cardiopulmonary resuscitation (CPR) or an electrical shock (defibrillation) to the heart to get
 the heart pumping again. You can make these procedure if you are trained to do it and if you have a certification.

patterns: What is covid-19
what is coronavirus ?
What are the symptoms of coronavirus?
Covid-19 symptoms
coronavirus symptoms
in what ways does covid-19 manifest itself?
in what ways does coronavirus manifest itself?
responses:
People with COVID-19 have had a wide range of symptoms reported - ranging from mild symptoms to severe illness. Symptoms may appear 2-14 days after exposure to the virus. Anyone can have mild to severe symptoms. 

 People with these symptoms may have COVID-19: 

 - Fever 

 - Cough 

 - Shortness of breath or difficulty breathing 

 - New loss of taste or smell 

 - Sore throat

 - Nausea or vomiting 

 - Congestion or runny nose 

 - Diarrhea

patterns: What is acne?

What are the causes of the acne?
responses: Acne is a skin condition caused by dead skin cells sticking together and clogging up pores. Bacteria can play a role, too. A big trigger for the onset of acne is puberty.

patterns: What is appendicitis?
What is the appendicitis?
what are the appendicitis symptoms?
Can I recognize the appendicitis?
in what ways does appendicitis manifest itself?
responses:
Appendicitis typically starts with a pain in the middle of your tummy (abdomen) that may come and go. Within hours, the pain travels to your lower right-hand side, where the appendix is usually located, and becomes constant and severe.
Pressing on this area, coughing or walking may make the pain worse.
If you have appendicitis, you may also have other symptoms, including:

- feeling sick (nausea)

- being sick

- loss of appetite

- constipation or diarrhoea

- a high temperature and a flushed face

patterns: What is asthma attack?
What is the asthma attack?
what are the asthma attack symptoms?
Can I recognize the asthma attack?
in what ways does asthma attack manifest itself?
responses:
the Asthma attack can happen suddenly, or gradually over a few days.

Signs of a severe asthma attack include:

- wheezing, coughing and chest tightness becoming severe and constant

-being too breathless to eat, speak or sleep

-breathing faster

-a fast heartbeat

-drowsiness, confusion, exhaustion or dizziness

-blue lips or fingers

-fainting
